tool_description: Creates a strategic phased rollout plan for app releases, managing user percentage distributions and rollback procedures.

release_strategy.description: Rollout strategy: conservative, standard, or aggressive

total_duration_days.description: Total planned rollout duration in days

initial_percentage.description: Initial user percentage for first phase (1-10)

error_messages: Invalid strategy: Release strategy must be one of: conservative, standard, or aggressive.
Invalid duration: Total duration must be between 1 and 90 days.
Invalid percentage: Initial percentage must be between 1 and 10.
Empty regions: At least one target region must be specified.
usage: Provide release_strategy, target_regions, and total_duration_days. Optionally set initial_percentage. Tool creates a detailed phased rollout schedule with monitoring checkpoints.

rollout_phases.description: Detailed phases with timelines and user percentages

monitoring_checkpoints.description: Key monitoring points and success criteria

rollback_triggers.description: Conditions that would trigger a rollback
